Kate Adebola Okikiolu (amụrụ n'afọ 1965) bụ onye Britain na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ. A maara ya maka ọrụ ya na ndị na-arụ ọrụ dị iche iche na-arụ yana ọrụ ya na ụmụaka nó n'ime obodo.
A mụrụ Okikiolu na 1965 na England

Nna ya bụ George Olatokunbo Okikiolu, onye na-eme mgbakọ na mwepụ na Naijịrịa ma ama na onye na-ede mgbakọ na mwepụta ojii kachasị ebipụta na ndekọ. Nne ya bụ onye Britain bụ onye nkuzi mgbakọ na mwepụ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ sekọndrị
na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Cambridge n'afọ 1987
ya na mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum California na Los Angeles, maka edemede ya: The Analogue of the Strong Szego Limit Theorem on the Torus and the 3-Sphere.
Dabere na ọrụ PhD ya, Okikiolu doziri conjecture nke Peter Wilcox Jones banyere mbipụta na-aga n'ihu nke nsogbu onye na-ere ahịa na-agagharị agagharị
na akwụkwọ ya Characterization of subsets of rectifiable curves in Rn

Okikiolu bụ onye nkuzi ma mesịa bụrụ osote prọfesọ na Mahadum Princeton site na 1993 ruo 1995. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ dị ka osote prọfesọ nleta na Massachusetts Institute of Technology wee sonye na ngalaba na-Mahadum California na San Diego na 1995. N'afọ 2011 ọ̀ sonyeere Ngalaba mgbakọ na mwepụ na Mahadum Johns Hopkins

Ọ bụ onye ọkà okwu a kpọrọ òkù na nzukọ 1996 nke Association of Women in Mathematics Ọ̀ kwukwara okwu Claytor-Woodard na nzukọ 2002 nke National Association of Mathematicians, otu nzukọ maka ndị African-American mathematicians.
N'afọ 1997, Okikiolu meriri Sloan Research Fellowship, na-aghọ onye isi ojii mbụ natara mkpakọrịta a

N'afọ 1997, e nyekwara ya ihe nrite Presidential Early Career Award maka ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na ndị injinia maka nyocha mgbakọ na mwepụ ya na mmepe nke usoro mgbakọ na mwepụta maka ụmụaka ụlọ akwụkwọ dị n'ime obodo
A na-enye naanị ndị ọkà mmụta sayensị na ndị injinia 60 onyinye a kwa afọ ma nwee ihe nrite nke $ 500,000.
